mapper.insert: insert into deliver_address (user_id, receiver_name, country, province, city, area, town, address, postcode, mobile_phone, tele_phone, default_status, create_time, creator, last_update_time, updater) values (#{userId}, #{receiverName}, #{country}, #{province}, #{city}, #{area}, #{town}, #{address}, #{postcode}, #{mobilePhone}, #{telePhone}, #{defaultStatus}, #{createTime}, #{creator}, #{lastUpdateTime}, #{updater})
mapper.select: select id, user_id, receiver_name, country, province, city, area, town, address, postcode, mobile_phone, tele_phone, default_status, create_time, creator, last_update_time, updater from deliver_address where id = #{id}

select id, user_id, receiver_name, country, province, city, area, town, address, postcode, mobile_phone, tele_phone, default_status, create_time, creator, last_update_time, updater from deliver_address where user_id = #{userId} order by default_status desc, create_time desc

select id, user_id, receiver_name, country, province, city, area, town, address, postcode, mobile_phone, tele_phone, default_status, create_time, creator, last_update_time, updater from deliver_address where user_id = #{userId} and default_status = '1' LIMIT 1
mapper.update: update deliver_address set default_status = #{defaultStatus}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime}, updater = #{updater} where id = #{id} and user_id = #{userId} and default_status != #{defaultStatus}
mapper.delete: delete from deliver_address where id = #{id} and user_id = #{userId}
